review_title: This is one of the best jobs I have ever had
pros: I met lots of interesting people, but more significantly, I learned about many non-profit organizations. There are over 30 organizations that call the Bronson Centre their home. Each one serves a need in Ottawa. The management met all the requests that I had.
cons: The salary was not very high, but it was a part time job. Therefore I did not stay, but found other full time employment. Sometimes the job was difficult when clients did not want to pay the amount that was required, but mostly they were interesting.
